channel.title: Mint | Based on Solace | Project
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YMvjPOv.png[/img][/center]
[center]Revision: 1.0[/center]
Hello. This is my first project here on MoparScape. The base we are going to be using is Solace, written by Faris.
[u][b]Update Log:[/b][/u]
[code] - Downloads 2/07/2013 - Downloaded Arithium's updated version of Solace. - Miscellaneous 2/07/2013 - Added all of the bones from the 377 revision to Prayer.XML. 2/07/2013 - Added over 1000 NPC spawn locations. 2/08/2013 - Added tons of item requirements. - Bug Fixes
- Updates
[/code]
Bugs & Errors: [code] Dialogue Nullpointer - [NOT FIXED] Logout Nullpointer - [NOT FIXED] [/code]
[u][b]Project Team:[/b][/u]
Allen Logan
[u][b]Features:[/b][/u]
Entity Based Combat System:
Ranged Magic Melee Special Attacks Prayer
Basic Features:
Bone burying in XML. NPC Thieving loaded in XML. Mining loaded in XML. Teleport system. Private Messaging. Equipment handling. Banking. Item handling. Item Requirements base. Dialogue system. Prayer draining. Status restoring. Special restoring. Basic following system. Ground item system. Object system. Weapon definitions. Spell definitions. Range definitions. Animations. Emotes. Player Updating. NPC Updating. Skill system. Projectile system. Basic freezing system. NIO Networking. New event system. Mint.
[u][b]Skilling:[/b][/u]
- Prayer All bones can be buried. (377 Revision) - Thieving NPC stealing loaded from npcthieving.XML. - Mining Ores loaded from ore.XML. Pickaxes loaded from pickaxe.XML. - Agility - Woodcutting - Firemaking - Fishing - Fletching - Farming - Cooking - Crafting - Runecrafting - Slayer - Smithing - Herblore
[u][b]Pictures:[/b][/u]
Package:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G18dWak.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Credits:[/b][/u]
Faris Sinisoul Arithium Graham KleptO Major

item.title: Mint | Based on Solace | Project
item.dc:creator: @relexlawl relexlawl
item.description:
@relexlawl wrote:

Solace = LightRune, since Faris C&P’d everything from LightRune, this was already proven long ago.

edit: @the name thing going on…I don’t see how a name like Mint can be ‘taken’, since it’s a word in our dictionary, not like you made it up…(I know it’s been said to be okay for him to use it, but still…)

Read full topic

item.title: Mint | Based on Solace | Project
item.dc:creator: @Allen Allen
item.description:
@Allen wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]Revision: 1.0[/center]

Hello. This is my first project here on MoparScape. The base we are going to be using is Solace, written by Faris.

Update Log:

- Downloads
2/07/2013 - Downloaded Arithium's updated version of Solace.
- Miscellaneous
2/07/2013 - Added all of the bones from the 377 revision to Prayer.XML.
2/07/2013 - Added over 1000 NPC spawn locations.
2/08/2013 - Added tons of item requirements.
- Bug Fixes

- Updates

Bugs & Errors:

Dialogue Nullpointer - [NOT FIXED]
Logout Nullpointer - [NOT FIXED]

Project Team:

Allen
Logan

Features:

Entity Based Combat System:

Ranged
Magic
Melee
Special Attacks
Prayer

Basic Features:

Bone burying in XML.
NPC Thieving loaded in XML.
Mining loaded in XML.
Teleport system.
Private Messaging.
Equipment handling.
Banking.
Item handling.
Item Requirements base.
Dialogue system.
Prayer draining.
Status restoring.
Special restoring.
Basic following system.
Ground item system.
Object system.
Weapon definitions.
Spell definitions.
Range definitions.
Animations.
Emotes.
Player Updating.
NPC Updating.
Skill system.
Projectile system.
Basic freezing system.
NIO Networking.
New event system.
Mint.

Skilling:

  • Prayer
    All bones can be buried. (377 Revision)
  • Thieving
    NPC stealing loaded from npcthieving.XML.
  • Mining
    Ores loaded from ore.XML.
    Pickaxes loaded from pickaxe.XML.
  • Agility
  • Woodcutting
  • Firemaking
  • Fishing
  • Fletching
  • Farming
  • Cooking
  • Crafting
  • Runecrafting
  • Slayer
  • Smithing
  • Herblore
